title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config, and data into a single Modelfile.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API; works in Node & browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async APIs, streaming support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter enabling Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with fzf model picker & chat REPL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat pane.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Micronaut & Spring Boot integrations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama API; supports streaming and model management.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot frontend for Ollama with TailwindCSS.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on to run Ollama locally and expose LLM services to automations.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack for Ollama with NVIDIA GPU runtime and CUDA drivers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and PVC.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama + SentenceTransformers + Chroma.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Official Discord bot integration for Ollama; supports slash commands and per-guild model selection.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that exposes Ollama models as tools to Claude Desktop & friends.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-distroless
summary: Community-maintained distroless container image of Ollama for minimal attack surface.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.
